sentences.sContent: I do not want your job, I want to be a vet and help animals.
sentences.sCn: 将来我并不想像您一样做首相，我想当个兽医，帮助动物。

sentences.sContent: If a pet shows signs of respiratory illness, please contact your vet.
sentences.sCn: 假如宠物出现呼吸疾病的症状，请与你的兽医联系。

trans.tranOther: someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals
